{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3417048,"name":"Gal","username":"GalDotan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/galdotan/{size}/201749_2.png","created_at":"2024-08-21T11:31:02.347Z","cooked":"

I wondered if you can connect one of the following to a big port in the PDH
4 CANcoder connected to wago and then a big port
Pigeon 2
The new vivid router
Canivore

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2024-08-21T11:31:02.347Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":31,"reads":144,"readers_count":143,"score":188.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":470091,"topic_slug":"what-can-you-connect-to-pdh-ports","display_username":"Gal","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60986,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5951 Software and electrical lead"},"post_url":"/t/what-can-you-connect-to-pdh-ports/470091/1","custom_user_title":"5951 Software and electrical lead","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3417071,"name":"Tauseef Afraz","username":"TFM110","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tfm110/{size}/197758_2.png","created_at":"2024-08-21T12:54:59.250Z","cooked":"

I would recommend using a Mini Power Module (MPM) instead of splicing from 1 big port from the PDH.

GalDotan:

4 CANcoder connected to wago and then a big port

You can do this from a single MPM port.

GalDotan:

Pigeon 2

Same thing here with MPM

GalDotan:

The new vivid router

Legal you can not do this this. R617B states that you must use PDH slots 20,21, or 22 with a 10A fuse

GalDotan:

Canivore

MPM as well
